altername_name: Piposaru Academia 2: Aiai Sarugee Janken Battle!
name: Ape Academy 2
overview: The primary antagonist, Specter, introduces a new card game which becomes very popular among humans and Pipo Monkeys alike. Using this card game, he dominates the world through culture manipulation, concurrently introducing a card battle contest for monkeys to complete in. The prize for winning the contest is the rare "Platinum Specter" trading card and a year's supply of bananas.
